stillbach.name: Stillbach
stillbach.description: You stand at the entrance of the village of Stillbach. Before you, a path stretches out between some rustic houses.

stillbach_road.name: Gravel Road
stillbach_road.description: You are on a gravel road that winds through the village. It ends at a central square with a fountain.

stillbach_blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
stillbach_blacksmith.description: You stand before the blacksmith of Stillbach. The warm sound of hammering metal reaches your ears.

stillbach_blacksmith_groundfloor.name: Ground Floor of the Blacksmith
stillbach_blacksmith_groundfloor.description: A crackling fire burns in the fireplace, while the anvil is ready for metalworking.

stillbach_blacksmith_firstfloor.name: First Floor of the Blacksmith
stillbach_blacksmith_firstfloor.description: You are on the first floor of the blacksmith. Shelves with tools and pieces of metal are arranged here.

stillbach_wellplace.name: Well Square
stillbach_wellplace.description: You stand at the picturesque well square. An old well adorns the center and the splashing water creates a calming atmosphere.

commands.move_selection_title: Where would you like to travel?
commands.talk_selection_title: Who would you like to talk to?
commands.talk_alone: You look around, but there seems to be no one here to talk to.
commands.talk_nobody: Those present only glance at you fleetingly and don't seem talkative.
commands.talk_not_good: Your instinct tells you it might be better not to talk to this person.
commands.grab_selection_title: Which item would you like to pick up?

text.default: Well my little child, where are your dear parents hmmmmm. Does your mother have a hot butt?

output.default: My Papa is the blacksmith of Stillbach. I locked him in the blacksmith and lost the key.
